Title: Coon 2: Hindsight (1)
Plot: The Coon now leads an entire team of crime-fighters. They are ready to take their place among the worlds most admired and beloved super heroes. But much to the Coons dismay, someone else keeps beating them to the punch. The nation looks to another hero to get them through the BP disaster and dissention develops within the ranks of Coon and friends.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
